This amazing luxury hi rise building is located in the heart of Streeterville just steps away from the Lake.
This building is just steps off of Michigan ave, the Lake, and Navy Pier and offers extremely easy access to freeways and public transportation.
Take advantage of this awesome 2 bed/2 bath unit.
This building has fabulous amenities including:
-24 hour doorman and dedicated maintenance staff
Pool and Jacuzzi with a huge sundeck too
-On site Dry Cleaner and laundry facility in bldg
